Class ProtoTorsion

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractTorsion
      • ProtoTorsion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Immutable, java.io.Serializable

    public class ProtoTorsion
extends AbstractTorsion
    Represents a torsion composed of concrete atoms.

    Torsion is: atom1-atom2-atom3-atom4

    Torsion angle calculated between atoms 2 and 3.

    For use in building peptides; not designed to be moved. If movement is desired, use AtomTorsion.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
